settings.blockquote_content: We make it easy for friends and family

slides.content:
That a wonderful day for our family, and especially you two.
May the joy you feel today last a lifetime.
slides.name: John Doe
slides.title: Husband

slides.content:
What a wonderful addition to our family. I'm so happy to share in
your celebration. Congratulations!
slides.name: Mary
slides.title: Wife

slides.content:
It seems like yesterday we were playing 'house' in the
backyard, and now you get to do it in real life. I couldn't be happier
for you both. Congratulations!
slides.name: Amanda
slides.title: Wife
